biotools.summary:
Framework to determine optimal parameter selection for a generic spike sorting algorithm.

Heuristic Spike Sort Tuner Readme.

Novel paradigm for optimal parameter selection of a generic spike sorting algorithm. Full code base written for Matlab 2018a is available here. Full documentation along with a getting started guide is in the HSST Manual.pdf.
